document_data.mainbody:
urrsh was a village located near the Lake of Steam.
The village was composed of a cluster of wattle-and-daub buildings. The people of the area mostly consisted of farmers.
In the , the village was the site of a meeting between Phyrea, the daughter of Senator Inthelph and Ivar Devorast, the chief engineer of the construction of the canal to connect the Lake of Steam with the Nagaflow. It was a secret meeting in which Phyrea was delivering a supply of saltpeter for the creation of smokepowder for the canal construction. The saltpeter came from her fathers estate of Berrywilde located near Innarlith.
